name: Born to Die (goatbeard)
description:
Escape from Board Game Hell as D the die!

Your objective: to battle various demons and the Devil himself to escape.

Game Board Mechanics

     Click on the die to see how far you will move this turn. You may land on multiple types of tiles:

     Some tiles will give you extra damage dice for your fights with demons, while some may steal dice away

     In combat you will be able to influence your die rolls—some tiles will make this easier or more difficult to do

     A demon tile! If you pass a demon tile you must fight the monster before progressing

Combat Mechanics

     When you land on a demon tile the game will switch into combat mode. You start the game with 3 dice in your damage dice pool—these determine how much damage you do to monsters AND your hit points for the encounter. The number of dice in your pool will change if you land on any tiles that add or take away dice.

         Example: If you have 3 dice your hit point total is 18 and you can do a maximum of 18 damage to the demon

     Rolling damage: You will roll your dice one at a time—click on the die to stop it from rolling. Try to get the highest number you can!

     *Some tiles will make the die cycle through numbers faster or slower

     The demon will roll damage against you at the same time—combat will continue until you or the demon dies!

     If the demon dies: you will return to the main game board. Roll again for your next turn.

     If you die: Game Over :(

Defeat the devil to win!

Good luck…and don’t die ;)
